events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want a refund because it doesn’t fit and I no longer want to keep it.
The issue was categorized as a refund request after reviewing the customer's message about returning the jacket.
The case was assigned to a customer service agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging so we can proceed with the refund process?
Yes, the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging. I have not worn it at all since receiving it.
Thank you for confirming. You can send the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will provide, and once we receive the item, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I appreciate your help with this process.
The prepaid return label has been emailed to you. Please send the jacket back within 14 days to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send the jacket back and if there’s anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday. I am looking forward to the refund and appreciate your follow-up.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your account within 3-5 business days.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our short survey about your recent refund experience.
The customer completed the feedback survey and rated their experience as very satisfactory with the refund process.
The refund case is now closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
